about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust tool for searching and indexing text within documents. It supports over 70 formats like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and ZIP files, making it easy to process large amounts of information efficiently.

more_features.title: Powerful tools for document search and indexing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} streamlines text search and indexing for over 70 file types, helping you find and manage information faster and with precision.

feature_1.title: Enhanced text search
feature_1.content: Find text quickly across various formats such as PDFs, Word documents, presentations, and spreadsheets. Use features like exact matches, wildcard searches, and fuzzy search for precise results.

feature_2.title: Efficient data indexing
feature_2.content: Build and manage indexes to speed up searches in large document collections. Indexing ensures fast and structured access to your data.

feature_3.title: Multilingual support
feature_3.content: Search in documents written in over 80 languages. Morphological support and keyboard layout compatibility enhance search results in different languages.

feature_4.title: Flexible search settings
feature_4.content: Customize your search by enabling case sensitivity, applying date filters, or skipping specific words and data during indexing.

formats.title: Search popular document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 70 file formats, providing flexible search rules and efficient indexing to save time and effort.

operations.title: Key capabilities of {{ProdShortName}}
operations.description: Unlock advanced, efficient, and customizable search features.
